languages.text: "И все же было совершено предательство. И покушение на меня и моих родичей. Он — убийца, а убийц надлежит судить".
"And yet treachery was committed. As well as the assassinations of my relatives and an attempt on my own life. He is a murderer, and a murderer must stand trial."
languages.original_text: "И все же было совершено предательство. И покушение на меня и моих родичей. Он — убийца, а убийц надлежит судить".

traits.locale_text: "And yet treason was committed. As well as assassinations of my relatives and an attempt on my own life. He is a murderer, and a murderer must stand trial."
traits.speaker: Chorda

traits.locale_text: "And yet treason was committed. As well as assassinations of my relatives and an attempt on my own life. He is a murderer, and a murderer must stand trial."
traits.speaker: Chorda

traits.locale_text: "And yet treason was committed. As well as the assassinations of my relatives and an attempt on my own life. He is a murderer, and a murderer must stand trial."
traits.speaker: Chorda

traits.locale_text: "And yet treason was committed. As well as the assassinations of my relatives and an attempt on my own life. He is a murderer, and a murderer must stand trial."
traits.speaker: Chorda

traits.locale_text: "And yet treachery was committed. As well as the assassinations of my relatives and an attempt on my own life. He is a murderer, and a murderer must stand trial."
traits.speaker: Chorda

traits.locale_text: "And yet treachery was committed. As well as the assassinations of my relatives and an attempt on my own life. He is a murderer, and a murderer must stand trial."
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: “但即便如此，他还是犯下了背叛的重罪。此外，他还害死了我的亲人，还曾打算杀死我本人。他是个杀人犯，杀人犯必须接受审判。”
languages.original_text: "And yet treachery was committed. As well as the assassinations of my relatives and an attempt on my own life. He is a murderer, and a murderer must stand trial."

traits.locale_text: “但即便如此，他还是犯下了叛国罪。此外，他还害死了我的亲人，还曾打算杀死我本人。他是个杀人犯，杀人犯必须接受审判。”
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: 「それにも関わらず、反逆罪は犯された。親戚は殺害され、私自身の命まで狙われた。彼は殺人犯だ。そして、殺人者は裁判を受けなければならない」
languages.original_text: "And yet treachery was committed. As well as the assassinations of my relatives and an attempt on my own life. He is a murderer, and a murderer must stand trial."

traits.locale_text: 「それにも関わらず、反逆罪は犯された。親戚は殺害され、私自身の命まで狙われた。彼は殺人犯だ。そして、殺人者は裁判を受けなければならない」
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: «Y, sin embargo, se cometió traición, así como el asesinato de mis familiares y mi propio intento de asesinato. Es un asesino y los asesinos deben ser juzgados».
languages.original_text: "And yet treachery was committed. As well as the assassinations of my relatives and an attempt on my own life. He is a murderer, and a murderer must stand trial."

traits.locale_text: «Y, sin embargo, se cometió traición, así como el asesinato de mis familiares y mi propio intento de asesinato. Es un asesino y los asesinos deben ser juzgados».
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: "Und doch wurde Hochverrat begangen. Und auch die Morde an meinen Verwandten und ein versuchtes Attentat auf mich selbst. Er ist ein Mörder, und ein Mörder muss vor Gericht gestellt werden."
languages.original_text: "And yet treachery was committed. As well as the assassinations of my relatives and an attempt on my own life. He is a murderer, and a murderer must stand trial."

traits.locale_text: "Und doch wurde Hochverrat begangen. Und auch die Morde an meinen Verwandten und ein versuchtes Attentat auf mich selbst. Er ist ein Mörder, und ein Mörder muss vor Gericht gestellt werden."
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: « Ça n'en était pas moins un acte de trahison, tout comme l'assassinat de mes proches et la tentative de meurtre à mon encontre. C'est un meurtrier et, en tant que tel, il doit être jugé. »
languages.original_text: "And yet treachery was committed. As well as the assassinations of my relatives and an attempt on my own life. He is a murderer, and a murderer must stand trial."

traits.locale_text: « Ça n'en était pas moins un acte de trahison, tout comme l'assassinat de mes proches et la tentative de meurtre à mon encontre. C'est un meurtrier et, en tant que tel, il doit être jugé. »
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: "Yine de ihanet etti. Akrabalarıma suikast düzenleyip benim hayatıma kastetti. O bir katil ve katiller yargılanmalıdır."
languages.original_text: "And yet treachery was committed. As well as the assassinations of my relatives and an attempt on my own life. He is a murderer, and a murderer must stand trial."

traits.locale_text: "Yine de ihanet gerçekleştirildi. Akrabalarımın suikastı ve benim yaşamıma kastedilme de. O bir katil ve katiller yargılanmalıdır."
traits.speaker: Chorda
